uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.session

Class PreferredViewComposite<AU extends AppUser>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.Composite<AU,X>
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.session.AppUserComposite<AU,PreferredViewComposite>
        • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.session.PreferredViewComposite<AU>
  • Type Parameters:
    AU - type of AppUser
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Contexed, TableStructureContributer<AU>, EmailParamContributor<AU>, NewSignupAction<AU>

    public class PreferredViewComposite<AU extends AppUser>
extends AppUserComposite<AU,PreferredViewComposite>
implements NewSignupAction<AU>, EmailParamContributor<AU>
    An AppUserComposite that returns an optional preferred view for AppUsers. This is when there are multiple flavours of an applications sharing a database but we want to tie certain users to a certain view. This is used to customise template email messages to the user. If set the parameter prefered_view.default defines the view URL (equivalent to service.saf.url that should be set for users created/signing-up). This should normally only be set within the view in question.
    Author:
    James Perry
